title: Episode 204: Hot Tub Writing Machine with Abigail Hing Wen
itunes:title: Episode 204: Hot Tub Writing Machine with Abigail Hing Wen
description:
Doree celebrates her family testing Covid-negative and Kate shouts out a lipstick that immediately makes her feel put together. Then, Abigail Hing Wen (Loveboat, Taipei and Loveboat Reunion) wakes up early for the pod to tell them about the film adaptation of her first book, how she spends part of every evening in a hot tub, and what Gen-Z has taught her about skincare.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter.


This episode is sponsored by:
